It is then syndicated via iTunes, Mediafly, Medfeedia, MeThings, Podcast, Zimbio, Podfeed.Net, Podcast.De, Blubrry, Zencast, Zimbio, LimeCast, Podcast Alley, PodcastDirectory and Odeo.
